text:
I'm trying to use the code in the linked godbolt page  <https://godbolt.org/z/jo3dc4>, but whatever I try I get
```undefined reference to `A::operator U2 T2::*()'```
or
```undefined reference to `A::operator U1 T1::*()'```
(depending on the compiler).  unless the compile error was the point :thinking_face:
